import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import '../customcss.css'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Modal, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import AddUser from '../users/AddUser'; export default function Home() { // add employee const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = React.useState(false); const showModal = () => { setIsOpen(true); }; const hideModal = () => { setIsOpen(false); }; const [users,setUsers]= useState([]) // self running running function useEffect(()=> { loadUsers(); }, []); const loadUsers=async()=>{ const result = await axios.get("http://localhost:8080/api/getEmployees"); setUsers(result.data); } return ( <> {/* Add modal */} Edit Employee
